instName: ﻿St. Stephen's Home for Destitute Little Girls
instNote: ﻿20 beds; under the direction of the "Society for the Protection of Destitute Roman Catholic Children in the City of New York," to the President of which all applications should be addressed, at his office, 25 Chambers street, New York; in charge of four Sisters of Charity, who also visit Bellevue Hospital and the sick and poor of the parish. Connected with the Home is a Charity School, at which the children (over 100) are provided with their dinner
